data.decision: Use Environment Build technique for glassmorphism backgrounds instead of visible gradient circles
data.rationale: Comparison proved giant off-canvas blobs (V2) achieve 85% match vs 40% with visible circles (V1). Glass only looks legitimate when background has large, unidentifiable shapes. The technique requires circles 120%+ of canvas size positioned 40-60% off-canvas so only slices are visible.
alternatives: Visible radial gradient circles on canvas
